mapper.update: update Directions d join Airports ai on d.airport_id=ai.id join Addresses ad on ai.address_id=ad.id set d.airport_id=(select id from Airports where Airports.address_id=(select id from Addresses where Addresses.locality=#{afterLocality})) where d.airport_id=(select id from Airports where Airports.address_id=(select id from Addresses where Addresses.locality=#{beforeLocality}))
